official_title: Phase 1/2 First-in-Human (FIH) Study of Leukocyte Immunoglobulin-Like Receptor B2 (LILRB2) Inhibitor Monoclonal Antibody (mAb) JTX-8064, as Monotherapy and in Combination With a Programmed Cell Death Receptor-1 (PD-1) Inhibitor, in Adult Subjects With Advanced Refractory Solid Tumor Malignancies
